casebody.data:
IN RE: J.A.M. 7PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 7, 2017 Richard Croutharmel, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Johnson, Jasmine. Christopher C. Peace, Attorney at Law, Keith S. Smith, Attorney at Law, for Mecklenburg County DSS. Caroline P. Mackie, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for GAL. Jacob E. Setzer, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Moses, Travis.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th of June 2017 by Guardian ad Litem to Withdraw and Substitute Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of July 2017."
